item.title: 6th New Orleans inmate captured after more than a week on the run
item.description: A sixth man who escaped from a New Orleans jail has been arrested after more than a week on the run, authorities announced.

item.title: Trump pardons Virginia sheriff convicted of federal bribery charges
item.description: President Donald Trump on Monday pardoned a Virginia sheriff who had been convicted of federal bribery charges and sentenced to 10 years in federal pr...

item.title: Shooting on South Carolina charter boat leaves 11 injured: Police
item.description: At least 11 people were transported to the hospital after a shooting in Little River, South Carolina, on Sunday.

item.title: WATCH: Truck explosion damages multiple homes in Chicago suburb

item.title: Former Rep. Charles Rangel, who spent 4 decades in Congress, dies at 94
item.description: Former New York Rep. Charles Rangel, a founding member of the Congressional Black Caucus who spent more than four decades in the House, has died at 94...
